definitions.text: time during which some action is awaited
examples: instant replay caused too long a delay
he ordered a hold in the action

definitions.text: the act of waiting (remaining inactive in one place while expecting something)
examples: the wait was an ordeal for him

definitions.text: stay in one place and anticipate or expect something
examples: I had to wait on line for an hour to get the tickets
the scientists held off announcing their results until they repeated the experiment

definitions.text: look forward to the probable occurrence of
examples: We were expecting a visit from our relatives
She is looking to a promotion
he is waiting to be drafted

definitions.text: serve as a waiter or waitress in a restaurant
examples: I'm waiting on tables at Maxim's
